scales 1.0.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Modify standard R colour in hcl colour space.

Source: R/colour-manip.r
col2hcl.Rd

Transforms rgb to hcl, sets non-missing arguments and then backtransforms to rgb.

col2hcl(colour, h, c, l, alpha = 1)

Arguments

colour

character vector of colours to be modified
h

new hue
c

new chroma
l

new luminance
alpha

alpha value. Defaults to 1.

Examples

col2hcl(colors())
#>   [1] "#FFFFFFFF" "#F0F8FFFF" "#FAEBD7FF" "#FFEFDBFF" "#EEDFCCFF" "#CDC0B0FF"
#>   [7] "#8B8378FF" "#7DFFD4FF" "#7DFFD4FF" "#74EEC6FF" "#65CDAAFF" "#448B74FF"
